clintock:AminoAcidKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Structural units that make up proteins. Activates at the end of each turn.

clintock:BindKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Consumes #ySugar and #yPhosphate to put a #yNucleobase into your first empty slot. If you have no empty slots, an #yAmino-Acid is generated to make room.

clintock:CytosineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Red #yNucleobase: Deals damage to a random enemy.

clintock:EssentialKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yAmino-Acids that must be supplied in diet. See the #bClintock #bWiki for a complete list.

clintock:Intron.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable status card that prevents #yNucleobases from evoking.

clintock:NonessentialKeyword.DESCRIPTION: #yAmino-Acids that can be synthesized in the body. See the #bClintock #bWiki for a complete list.

clintock:NucleobaseKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Fundamental units of the genetic code found in DNA (#yAdenine, #yCytosine, #yGuanine, and #yThymine).

clintock:PeptideChainKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Group of #yAmino-Acids that activate at the end of each turn.

clintock:PhosphateKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Phosphorus bound to four oxygen residues. Necessary molecule in generating nucleotides.

clintock:SugarKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Specifically deoxyribose. Necessary molecule in generating nucleotides.

clintock:ThymineKeyword.DESCRIPTION: Yellow #yNucleobase: Deals damage to ALL enemies.
